title: [Feat]: Open Teams in PWA mode
body:
### Describe the feature

Make the Teams website "believe" it's running as a PWA.

### Motivation

It would hide some things like the apps menu on the top left hand corner.

### Alternatives

You could possibly manually hide those elements, similar to how uBlock Origin can hide them.

### Additional context

The manifest.json might help: https://teams.microsoft.com/v2/manifest.json

Just opening this URL doesn't work, you probably have to spoof something else in the app for it to load as a PWA: https://teams.microsoft.com/v2/?clientType=pwa
